content.text:
Check the HEARTBEAT.md file at /root/clawd/HEARTBEAT.md to see if there are any active tasks or items that need attention.

1. Read the HEARTBEAT.md file
2. Look at the Active Tasks section
3. Check if there are any pending tasks, incomplete work, or items that need attention
4. Look at Priority 0 (Knowledge Graph), Priority 1 (Pending Cron Results), Priority 2 (Unread System Events)
5. Check if there are any continuous background work tasks in Priority 3

If there are NO active tasks and nothing that needs attention, reply with exactly: HEARTBEAT_OK

If there IS something that needs attention, describe what needs to be done and provide the details.
